operations

items.title: Free for Dev
items.content_text:
### Feature Toggles Management Platforms

*   [Hypertune](https://www.hypertune.com) - Type-safe feature flags, A/B testing, analytics and app configuration, with Git-style version control and synchronous, in-memory, local flag evaluation. Free for up to 5 team members with unlimited feature flags and A/B tests.
items.content_html:
Feature Toggles Management Platforms

  • Hypertune - Type-safe feature flags, A/B testing, analytics and app configuration, with Git-style version control and synchronous, in-memory, local flag evaluation. Free for up to 5 team members with unlimited feature flags and A/B tests.

items.title: Awesome Algorithms
items.content_text:

items.content_html:
Online Courses

items.title: Awesome Osint
items.content_text:
### Speciality Search Engines

*   [Mamont](https://www.mmnt.ru/)
*   [Netlas.io](https://app.netlas.io/)
*   [WorldWideScience.org](http://worldwidescience.org)

### File Search

*   [File Search Engine](https://www.filesearch.link/)
*   [FileListing](https://filelisting.com/)
*   [SearchFiles.de](https://searchfiles.de/)

### Pastebins

*   [0bin](https://0bin.net)
*   [dpaste2](https://Dpaste.org)
*   [dpaste](https://Dpaste.com)
*   [paste.centos](https://paste.centos.org)

### Code Search

*   [grep.app](https://grep.app/) - Searches code from the entire github public repositories for a given specific string or using regular expression.
*   [PublicWWW](https://publicwww.com/)
*   [Reposearch](http://codefinder.org/)

### Real-Time Search, Social Media Search, and General Social Media Tools

*   [Castrick](https://castrickclues.com) - Find social media accounts with email, username and phone number
*   [Hootsuite](http://hootsuite.com)
*   [Klear](http://klear.com)
*   [Kribrum](https://kribrum.io/)
*   [Mail.Ru Social Network Search](https://go.mail.ru/search_social)
*   [Oblivion (‚≠ê557)](https://github.com/loseys/Oblivion)
*   [Profil3r](https://github.com/Rog3rSm1th/Profil3r)
*   [Social DownORNot](http://social.downornot.com)
*   [Social Searcher](http://www.social-searcher.com)

### Social Media Tools / Facebook

*   [Fanpage Karma](http://www.fanpagekarma.com)
*   [Fb-sleep-stats (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/sqren/fb-sleep-stats) - Use Facebook to track your friends‚Äô sleeping habits.
*   [Find my Facebook ID](https://randomtools.io) - To find your Facebook personal numeric ID for facebook graph API operations, fb:admins, social plugins.
*   [haveibeenzuckered](https://haveibeenzuckered.com/) - A large dataset containing 533 million Facebook accounts was made available for download. The data was obtained by exploiting a vulnerability that was, according to Facebook, corrected in August 2019. Check if a telephone number is present within the Facebook data breach.
*   [Lookup-ID.com](https://lookup-id.com) - Looking for your Facebook profile ID / Group ID / Page ID.

### Social Media Tools / Instagram

*   [Picodash](https://www.picodash.com) - Find Instagram Target Audience and Influencers
*   [Sterra (‚≠ê627)](https://github.com/novitae/sterraxcyl) - Instagram OSINT tool to export and analyse followers | following with their details

### Forums and Discussion Boards Search / GitHub

*   [4chan Search](https://4chansearch.com/)
*   [LinkBase](https://link-base.org/)

### Username Check / GitHub

*   [CheckUser](https://checkuser.vercel.app/) - search username across social networks
*   [Maigret (‚≠ê16k)](https://github.com/soxoj/maigret) - Collect a dossier on a person by username.
*   [Name Chk](http://www.namechk.com) - Check over 30 domains and more than 90 social media account platforms.
*   [Name Checkr](http://www.namecheckr.com) - checks a domain and username across many platforms.
*   [User Search](http://www.usersearch.org) - Find someone by username, email, phone number or picture across Social Networks, Dating Sites, Forums, Crypto Forums, Chat Sites and Blogs, 3000+ sites Supported!
*   [WhatsMyName](https://whatsmyname.app/) - check for usernames across many different platforms.

### People Investigations / GitHub

*   [411 (US)](http://www.411.com) - Search by person, phone number, address, and business. Limited free info, premium data upsell.
*   [BeenVerified](https://www.backgroundchecks.com/solutions/beenverified)
*   [Mugshots](https://mugshots.com/)
*   [The National Archives (UK)](http://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk) - Search UK national archives.
*   [VineLink](https://www.vinelink.com/#state-selection) - Inmate search and notification service for victims of crime, linked to multiple correctional facilities' booking systems in the U.S.

### Email Search / Email Check / GitHub

*   [Email Address Validator](http://www.email-validator.net)  - Improve deliverability, reduce bounce rates, prevent fraud and minimize funnel leaks.
*   [Email Permutator](https://www.polished.app/email-permutator/) - a powerful tool designed to aid professionals in generating a range of potential email addresses for a specific contact.
*   [EmailHippo](https://tools.verifyemailaddress.io) - is an email address verification platform that will check whether a given email address exist or not.
*   [Ghunt (‚≠ê17k)](https://github.com/mxrch/GHunt) - Investigate Google emails and documents.
*   [Gitrecon (‚≠ê38)](https://github.com/atiilla/gitrecon) - Node.js tool to scan GitHub repositories for exposed email addresses and names.
*   [Holehe (‚≠ê9k)](https://github.com/megadose/holehe) - allows you to check if the mail is used on different sites like twitter, instagram and will retrieve information on sites with the forgotten password function.
*   [MailTester](http://mailtester.com) - hunt for emails and improve your email deliverability
*   [Peepmail](http://www.samy.pl/peepmail) - is a tool that allows you to discover business email addresses for users, even if their email address may not be publicly available or shared.
*   [Pipl](https://pipl.com) - a provider of identity solutions.
*   [Snov.io](https://snov.io/email-finder) - Find email addresses on any website.
*   [ThatsThem](https://thatsthem.com/reverse-email-lookup) - Reverse Email Lookup.
*   [Toofr](https://www.toofr.com) - Find Anyone‚Äôs Email Address in Seconds.
*   [Verify Email](http://verify-email.org) - The fastest and most accurate email verification tool.

### Phone Number Research / GitHub

*   [CallerID Test](https://calleridtest.com/) - Get caller ID and telco carrier information back from a phone number.
*   [EmobileTracker.com](https://www.emobiletracker.com/) - a service specifically designed to Track Mobile Number, Location on Google Map including information such as the owner's Name,Location,Country,Telecom provider.
*   [FreeCarrierLookup](https://freecarrierlookup.com/) - enter a phone number and we'll return the carrier name and whether the number is wireless or landline. We also return the email-to-SMS and email-to-MMS gateway addresses for USA and Canadian\* phone numbers.
*   [Infobel](https://www.infobel.com/) - Search 164+ million records across 73 countries for companies and individuals. Find places, local service providers, their contact details, reviews, opening hours and more.
*   [PhoneInfoga (‚≠ê15k)](https://github.com/sundowndev/PhoneInfoga) - Advanced information gathering & OSINT framework for phone numbers.
*   [Sync.ME](https://sync.me/) - a caller ID and spam blocker app.
*   [Twilio](https://www.twilio.com/docs/lookup/v2-api) - Look up a phone numbers carrier type, location, etc. Twilio offers free accounts that come with credits you can use with their API. Each lookup is only \~$0.01-$0.02 typically on US and CAN numbers.

### Company Research / GitHub

*   [BrownBook](https://www.brownbook.net/)
*   [Business Source](https://www.ebscohost.com/academic/business-source-complete)
*   [Caselaw Access Project](https://case.law/) - Collection of full text of historical (not up-to-date) cases from United States state appellate courts.
*   [CorporationWiki](https://www.corporationwiki.com/)
*   [GoodFirms](https://www.goodfirms.co/)
*   [National Company Registers](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_company_registers)
*   [Orbis directory](http://orbisdirectory.bvdinfo.com/version-20161014/OrbisDirectory/Companies)

### Job Search Resources / GitHub

*   [RecruitEm](https://recruitin.net/)

### Domain and IP Research / GitHub

*   [DNSDumpster](https://dnsdumpster.com) - is a website that will help you discover hosts related to a specific domain.
*   [IP Checking](http://www.ipchecking.com)
*   [IP Location](https://www.iplocation.net) - is used for mapping of an IP address or MAC address to the real-world geographic location of an Internet-connected computing or a mobile device.
*   [OpenLinkProfiler](http://www.openlinkprofiler.org/)
*   [StatsCrop](http://www.statscrop.com)
*   [TinyScan](https://www.tiny-scan.com) - Another powerful URL scan tool that provides comprehensive information about any given URL. Get insights into IP address, location, screenshots, technology stack, performance metrics, and more.
*   [urlscan](https://urlscan.io/) -  is a free service to scan and analyse websites.
*   [Validin](https://app.validin.com/) - Website and API to search current and historical DNS records for free
*   [Verisign](http://dnssec-debugger.verisignlabs.com)
*   [ViewDNS.info](http://viewdns.info)
*   [w3snoop](http://webboar.com.w3snoop.com) - is a website that gives you a free and comprehensive report about a specific website.
*   [You Get Signal](http://www.yougetsignal.com)

### Keywords Discovery and Research / GitHub

*   [Word Tracker](https://www.wordtracker.com)

### Image Search / GitHub

*   [Betaface](https://www.betaface.com/demo.html)
*   [GeoSpyer (‚≠ê384)](https://github.com/atiilla/geospy "Original service: https://geospy.web.app/") - Python tool using Graylark's AI-powered geo-location service to uncover the location where photos were taken.

### Image Analysis / GitHub

*   [DiffChecker](https://www.diffchecker.com/image-diff/)
*   [Forensically](https://29a.ch/photo-forensics/)
*   [GeoSpy](https://geospy.web.app/) - AI based image osint tool
*   [ImgOps](https://imgops.com/)
*   [JIMPL](https://jimpl.com/) - Online EXIF data viewer

### Video Search and Other Video Tools / GitHub

*   [Deturl](http://deturl.com) - Download a YouTube video from any web page.
*   [Earthcam](http://www.earthcam.com) - EarthCam is the leading network of live streaming webcams for tourism and entertainment.
*   [Filmot](https://filmot.com/) - Search within YouTube subtitles. Indexing over 573 million captions across 528 million videos and 45 million channels.
*   [Frame by Frame](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/frame-by-frame/cclnaabdfgnehogonpeddbgejclcjneh/) - Browser plugin that allows you to watch YouTube videos frame by frame.
*   [Insecam](http://insecam.org/) - Live cameras directory
*   [Video Stabilization Methods (‚≠ê453)](https://github.com/yaochih/awesome-video-stabilization)
*   [YouTube Metadata](https://mattw.io/youtube-metadata/)
*   [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com)

### Academic Resources and Grey Literature / GitHub

*   [Grey Literature ‚Äì List of Gateways](http://csulb.libguides.com/graylit)
*   [Open Access Scientific Journals](http://www.pagepress.org)
*   [Science Publications](http://www.thescipub.com)
*   [ScienceDomain](http://www.sciencedomain.org)
*   [The Collection of Computer Science Bibliographies](https://liinwww.ira.uka.de/bibliography/index.html) - The CCSB is a collection of bibliographies of scientific literature in computer science from various sources, covering most aspects of computer science.
*   [The Open Syllabus Project](http://opensyllabusproject.org/)

### Geospatial Research and Mapping Tools / GitHub

*   [ArcGIS](https://livingatlas.arcgis.com/en/browse/)
*   [Baidu Maps](https://map.baidu.com/)
*   [Descartes Labs](https://maps.descarteslabs.com/)
*   [digiKam](https://www.digikam.org/)
*   [GeoGig](http://geogig.org)
*   [GeoNames](http://www.geonames.org)
*   [Google Earth](http://www.google.com/earth)
*   [InstantAtlas](http://www.instantatlas.com)
*   [KartaView](https://kartaview.org/map/)
*   [Liveuamap](https://liveuamap.com/)
*   [Map Maker](https://maps.co)
*   [MapChecking](https://www.mapchecking.com/)
*   [Mapillary](https://www.mapillary.com/app/)
*   [Maxar](https://discover.digitalglobe.com/)
*   [Open Street Map](http://www.openstreetmap.org)
*   [Pic2Map](https://www.pic2map.com/)
*   [Polymaps](http://polymaps.org)
*   [Satellites Pro](https://satellites.pro/)
*   [SatIntel (‚≠ê756)](https://github.com/ANG13T/SatIntel)
*   [Sentinel Hub](https://www.sentinel-hub.com/explore/sentinelplayground/)
*   [SOAR](https://soar.earth/)
*   [StoryMaps](http://storymaps.arcgis.com/en)
*   [SunCalc](https://www.suncalc.org/)
*   [USGS (EarthExplorer)](https://earthexplorer.usgs.gov/)
*   [ViaMichelin](http://www.viamichelin.com)
*   [Windy](https://www.windy.com/)

### Infographics and Data Visualization / GitHub

*   [Leaflet](http://leafletjs.com) - an open-source JavaScript library for mobile-friendly interactive maps.
*   [OpenLayers](http://openlayers.org) - A high-performance, feature-packed library for all your mapping needs.
*   [Chart.js](http://www.chartjs.org) - a javascript library that allows you to create charts easly
*   [Data Visualization Catalogue](http://datavizcatalogue.com)
*   [Inkscape](https://inkscape.org)
*   [jqPlot](http://www.jqplot.com) - A Versatile and Expandable jQuery Plotting Plugin.
*   [Listify](http://listify.okfnlabs.org) - Turn a Google spreadsheet into a beautiful, searchable listing in seconds.
*   [Lucidchart](https://www.lucidchart.com) - the intelligent diagramming application that brings teams together to make better decisions and build the future.
*   [Nodebox](https://www.nodebox.net) - a family of tools gives you the leverage to create generative design the way you want.
*   [Observable](https://observablehq.com/) - a modern way to create powerful, performant, polyglot data apps built on open source.
*   [Palladio](http://hdlab.stanford.edu/palladio) - Visualize complex historical data with ease.
*   [Preceden](https://www.preceden.com/) - Create a Visual Timeline About Any Topic
*   [StoryMap](https://storymap.knightlab.com)
*   [Tableau](http://www.tableau.com)
*   [Tiki-toki](http://www.tiki-toki.com)

### Data and Statistics / GitHub

*   [BP Statistical Review of World Energy](http://www.bp.com/en/global/corporate/energy-economics/statistical-review-of-world-energy.html)
*   [CIA World Factbook](https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook)
*   [ILOSTAT](http://www.ilo.org/ilostat/faces/oracle/webcenter/portalapp/pagehierarchy/Page137.jspx?_afrLoop=443508925711569\&clean=true#%40%3F_afrLoop%3D443508925711569%26clean%3Dtrue%26_adf.ctrl-state%3Dl4dwldaf3_9)
*   [International Labour Comparisons](http://www.bls.gov/fls/chartbook.htm)
*   [International Trade Center](http://www.intracen.org/ByCountry.aspx)
*   [UN Data](http://data.un.org)
*   [Vizala](https://vizala.com)
*   [World Bank Data](http://datatopics.worldbank.org/consumption/home)

### VPN Services / GitHub

*   [OffShore.cat](https://offshore.cat/vpn) - list of vpns for the privacy conscious

### Social Network Analysis / GitHub

*   [Wynyard Group](https://wynyardgroup.com)

### Privacy and Encryption Tools / GitHub

*   [Qubes](https://www.qubes-os.org) - a security-focused desktop operating system that aims to provide security through isolation.

### DNS / GitHub

*   [findsubdomains](https://findsubdomains.com/) - Automatically scans different sources to collect as many subdomains as can. Validate all the data through various tools and services to provide correct results without waiting.

### Other Tools / GitHub

*   [FOCA (‚≠ê3.2k)](https://github.com/ElevenPaths/FOCA) - Tool to find metadata and hidden information in the documents.
*   [Hunchly](https://www.hunch.ly/) - Hunchly is a web capture tool designed specifically for online investigations.
*   [LinkScope Client (‚≠ê388)](https://github.com/AccentuSoft/LinkScope_Client) - LinkScope Client Github repository.
*   [OSINT-Tool](https://www.osint-tool.com/) - A browser extension that gives you access to a suite of OSINT utilities (Dehashed, Epieos, Domaintools, Exif data, Reverse image search, etc) directly on any webpage you visit.
*   [OSINT.SH](https://osint.sh/) - Information Gathering Toolset.
*   [pygreynoise (‚≠ê153)](https://github.com/GreyNoise-Intelligence/pygreynoise) - Greynoise Python Library
*   [SerpScan (‚≠ê66)](https://github.com/Alaa-abdulridha/SerpScan) - Powerful PHP script designed to allow you to leverage the power of dorking straight from the comfort of your command line. Analyzes data from Google, Bing, Yahoo, Yandex, and Badiu.
*   [SpiderFoot (‚≠ê15k)](https://github.com/smicallef/spiderfoot) - SpiderFoot Github repository.
*   [The Harvester (‚≠ê13k)](https://github.com/laramies/theHarvester) - Gather emails, subdomains, hosts, employee names, open ports and banners from different public sources like search engines, PGP key servers and SHODAN computer database.
*   [Zen (‚≠ê577)](https://github.com/s0md3v/Zen) - Find email addresses of Github users urls and other data effortlessly

### Threat Intelligence / GitHub

*   [OTX AlienVault](https://otx.alienvault.com/) - Open Threat Exchange is the neighborhood watch of the global intelligence community. It enables private companies, independent security researchers, and government agencies to openly collaborate and share the latest information about emerging threats, attack methods, and malicious actors, promoting greater security across the entire community.
*   [REScure Threat Intel Feed](https://rescure.fruxlabs.com/) - REScure is an independent threat intelligence project which we undertook to enhance our understanding of distributed systems, their integration, the nature of threat intelligence and how to efficiently collect, store, consume, distribute it.

### OSINT Videos / GitHub

*   [Data to Go](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_YRs28yBYuI)
*   [See how easily freaks can take over your life](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rn4Rupla11M)

Speciality Search Engines

  • Mamont
  • Netlas.io
  • WorldWideScience.org

File Search

  • Hootsuite
  • Klear

  • Profil3r
  • Social DownORNot
  • Social Searcher

  • Lookup-ID.com - Looking for your Facebook profile ID / Group ID / Page ID.

Forums and Discussion Boards Search / GitHub

Username Check / GitHub

  • Name Chk - Check over 30 domains and more than 90 social media account platforms.
  • Name Checkr - checks a domain and username across many platforms.

  • BeenVerified
  • Mugshots
  • The National Archives (UK) - Search UK national archives.
  • VineLink - Inmate search and notification service for victims of crime, linked to multiple correctional facilities' booking systems in the U.S.

Email Search / Email Check / GitHub

  • Email Permutator - a powerful tool designed to aid professionals in generating a range of potential email addresses for a specific contact.
  • EmailHippo - is an email address verification platform that will check whether a given email address exist or not.

  • Gitrecon (‚≠ê38) - Node.js tool to scan GitHub repositories for exposed email addresses and names.
  • Holehe (‚≠ê9k) - allows you to check if the mail is used on different sites like twitter, instagram and will retrieve information on sites with the forgotten password function.
  • MailTester - hunt for emails and improve your email deliverability
  • Peepmail - is a tool that allows you to discover business email addresses for users, even if their email address may not be publicly available or shared.
  • Pipl - a provider of identity solutions.
  • Snov.io - Find email addresses on any website.
  • ThatsThem - Reverse Email Lookup.
  • Toofr - Find Anyone‚Äôs Email Address in Seconds.
  • Verify Email - The fastest and most accurate email verification tool.

Phone Number Research / GitHub

  • CallerID Test - Get caller ID and telco carrier information back from a phone number.
  • EmobileTracker.com - a service specifically designed to Track Mobile Number, Location on Google Map including information such as the owner's Name,Location,Country,Telecom provider.
  • FreeCarrierLookup - enter a phone number and we'll return the carrier name and whether the number is wireless or landline. We also return the email-to-SMS and email-to-MMS gateway addresses for USA and Canadian* phone numbers.

  • PhoneInfoga (‚≠ê15k) - Advanced information gathering & OSINT framework for phone numbers.
  • Sync.ME - a caller ID and spam blocker app.
  • Twilio - Look up a phone numbers carrier type, location, etc. Twilio offers free accounts that come with credits you can use with their API. Each lookup is only ~$0.01-$0.02 typically on US and CAN numbers.

Company Research / GitHub

  • BrownBook
  • Business Source
  • Caselaw Access Project - Collection of full text of historical (not up-to-date) cases from United States state appellate courts.
  • CorporationWiki
  • GoodFirms
  • National Company Registers
  • Orbis directory

Job Search Resources / GitHub

  • RecruitEm

Domain and IP Research / GitHub

  • DNSDumpster - is a website that will help you discover hosts related to a specific domain.
  • IP Checking
  • IP Location - is used for mapping of an IP address or MAC address to the real-world geographic location of an Internet-connected computing or a mobile device.
  • OpenLinkProfiler
  • StatsCrop
  • TinyScan - Another powerful URL scan tool that provides comprehensive information about any given URL. Get insights into IP address, location, screenshots, technology stack, performance metrics, and more.
  • urlscan - is a free service to scan and analyse websites.
  • Validin - Website and API to search current and historical DNS records for free
  • Verisign
  • ViewDNS.info
  • w3snoop - is a website that gives you a free and comprehensive report about a specific website.
  • You Get Signal

Keywords Discovery and Research / GitHub

  • Word Tracker

Image Search / GitHub

  • Betaface
  • GeoSpyer (‚≠ê384) - Python tool using Graylark's AI-powered geo-location service to uncover the location where photos were taken.

Image Analysis / GitHub

  • DiffChecker
  • Forensically
  • GeoSpy - AI based image osint tool
  • ImgOps
  • JIMPL - Online EXIF data viewer

Video Search and Other Video Tools / GitHub

  • Deturl - Download a YouTube video from any web page.
  • Earthcam - EarthCam is the leading network of live streaming webcams for tourism and entertainment.
  • Filmot - Search within YouTube subtitles. Indexing over 573 million captions across 528 million videos and 45 million channels.
  • Frame by Frame - Browser plugin that allows you to watch YouTube videos frame by frame.
  • Insecam - Live cameras directory
  • Video Stabilization Methods (‚≠ê453)
  • YouTube Metadata
  • YouTube

Academic Resources and Grey Literature / GitHub

  • Grey Literature ‚Äì List of Gateways
  • Open Access Scientific Journals
  • Science Publications
  • ScienceDomain
  • The Collection of Computer Science Bibliographies - The CCSB is a collection of bibliographies of scientific literature in computer science from various sources, covering most aspects of computer science.
  • The Open Syllabus Project

Geospatial Research and Mapping Tools / GitHub

  • ArcGIS
  • Baidu Maps
  • Descartes Labs
  • digiKam
  • GeoGig
  • GeoNames
  • Google Earth
  • InstantAtlas
  • KartaView
  • Liveuamap
  • Map Maker
  • MapChecking
  • Mapillary
  • Maxar
  • Open Street Map
  • Pic2Map
  • Polymaps
  • Satellites Pro
  • SatIntel (‚≠ê756)
  • Sentinel Hub
  • SOAR
  • StoryMaps
  • SunCalc
  • USGS (EarthExplorer)
  • ViaMichelin
  • Windy

Infographics and Data Visualization / GitHub

  • Leaflet - an open-source JavaScript library for mobile-friendly interactive maps.
  • OpenLayers - A high-performance, feature-packed library for all your mapping needs.
  • Chart.js - a javascript library that allows you to create charts easly
  • Data Visualization Catalogue
  • Inkscape
  • jqPlot - A Versatile and Expandable jQuery Plotting Plugin.
  • Listify - Turn a Google spreadsheet into a beautiful, searchable listing in seconds.
  • Lucidchart - the intelligent diagramming application that brings teams together to make better decisions and build the future.
  • Nodebox - a family of tools gives you the leverage to create generative design the way you want.
  • Observable - a modern way to create powerful, performant, polyglot data apps built on open source.
  • Palladio - Visualize complex historical data with ease.
  • Preceden - Create a Visual Timeline About Any Topic
  • StoryMap
  • Tableau
  • Tiki-toki

Data and Statistics / GitHub

  • BP Statistical Review of World Energy
  • CIA World Factbook
  • ILOSTAT
  • International Labour Comparisons
  • International Trade Center
  • UN Data
  • Vizala
  • World Bank Data

VPN Services / GitHub

  • OffShore.cat - list of vpns for the privacy conscious

Social Network Analysis / GitHub

  • Wynyard Group

Privacy and Encryption Tools / GitHub

  • Qubes - a security-focused desktop operating system that aims to provide security through isolation.

DNS / GitHub

  • findsubdomains - Automatically scans different sources to collect as many subdomains as can. Validate all the data through various tools and services to provide correct results without waiting.

Other Tools / GitHub

  • FOCA (‚≠ê3.2k) - Tool to find metadata and hidden information in the documents.
  • Hunchly - Hunchly is a web capture tool designed specifically for online investigations.
  • LinkScope Client (‚≠ê388) - LinkScope Client Github repository.
  • OSINT-Tool - A browser extension that gives you access to a suite of OSINT utilities (Dehashed, Epieos, Domaintools, Exif data, Reverse image search, etc) directly on any webpage you visit.
  • OSINT.SH - Information Gathering Toolset.
  • pygreynoise (‚≠ê153) - Greynoise Python Library
  • SerpScan (‚≠ê66) - Powerful PHP script designed to allow you to leverage the power of dorking straight from the comfort of your command line. Analyzes data from Google, Bing, Yahoo, Yandex, and Badiu.
  • SpiderFoot (‚≠ê15k) - SpiderFoot Github repository.
  • The Harvester (‚≠ê13k) - Gather emails, subdomains, hosts, employee names, open ports and banners from different public sources like search engines, PGP key servers and SHODAN computer database.
  • Zen (‚≠ê577) - Find email addresses of Github users urls and other data effortlessly

Threat Intelligence / GitHub

  • OTX AlienVault - Open Threat Exchange is the neighborhood watch of the global intelligence community. It enables private companies, independent security researchers, and government agencies to openly collaborate and share the latest information about emerging threats, attack methods, and malicious actors, promoting greater security across the entire community.
  • REScure Threat Intel Feed - REScure is an independent threat intelligence project which we undertook to enhance our understanding of distributed systems, their integration, the nature of threat intelligence and how to efficiently collect, store, consume, distribute it.

OSINT Videos / GitHub

  • Data to Go
  • See how easily freaks can take over your life

items.title: Awesome Polars
items.content_text:
### Talks and videos / Miscellaneous

*   [Pandas, Polars and the DataDrame Consortium](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-kz1EAhlflM) ‚è≥ 25 min - A video that offers a detailed performance comparison between Polars and Pandas. This analysis serves as a foundation for the introduction of the DataFrame Consortium, which aims to standardize data manipulation libraries.
